[[Markus Giesler]] in his ethnography "Consumer Gift Systems" has developed music downloading as a system of social solidarity based on gift transactions.<ref>Markus Giesler, [http://www.mymacexperience.com/GieslerJCR1.pdf Consumer Gift Systems]{{Verify credibility|date=June 2010}}</ref>

==== Free software ====
+
==== Open-Source ====
In his essay [[Homesteading the Noosphere]], [[Eric Raymond]] proposed that [[open source]] developers have created "a `gift culture' in which participants compete for prestige by giving time, energy, and creativity away".<ref>http://catb.org/esr/writings/homesteading/homesteading/</ref>
In his essay [[Homesteading the Noosphere]], [[Eric Raymond]] proposed that [[open source]] developers have created "a `gift culture' in which participants compete for prestige by giving time, energy, and creativity away".<ref>http://catb.org/esr/writings/homesteading/homesteading/</ref>
